articles.title: Pak leader defends 'beggars can't be choosers' remark after Imran's ‘slave’ jibe - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Pakistan Prime Minister Khan, who is set to face a no-confidence vote on Sunday, has been targeting Shehbaz Sharif in interviews and public addresses, calling him a “slave of America”. | World News
articles.content: Pakistan's Leader of Opposition Shahbaz Sharif on Saturday defended his "beggars can't be choosers" remarks after drawing the ire of embattled Prime Minister Imran Khan and his supporters. The Pakist… [+2103 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Morris
articles.title: Energy groups target Biden administration over unwillingness to expand domestic oil production - Fox Business
articles.description: Two prominent American energy groups are targeting the Biden administration over its dismissal of domestic oil and gas production, one with a five figure ad purchase and another whose president will offer testimony before the Senate next week.

articles.title: How we will know when COVID-19 has become endemic - American Medical Association
articles.description: Infectious diseases physician Stephen Parodi, MD, distinguishes between pandemics and endemics and points to signs that show where COVID-19 is moving.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization declared the COVID-19 outbreak a pandemic on March 11, 2020. Now,  more than two years later, society is at a crossroads, according to AMA member Stephen Parodi, MD.
